originalText.text: My daughter loves SHHK so much and Esther has always gone out of her way to make their time together meaningful and our experience as parents easy and accommodating to wild work schedules. The program is loose but has structure, which is all you can hope for in an after school program for a range of ages. Her homework is always done and she learns and plays and loves every minute of it. How much does my daughter love SHHK? So much that she said she was sad for summer because she wouldn't get to see Miss Esther.

originalText.text: My daughter joined SHHK for after school this year and has just completed her first mid winter recess camp with Ms. Yang. First and foremost, Ms. Yang is amazing with the kids and keeps them focused and also has a lot of fun with them. My daughter went on a day trip each day this week. She loved it. She has worked with me to help my daughter learn patience and different skills. I am so happy my daughter is now part of the SHHK family!

text.text: My daughter joined SHHK for after school this year and has just completed her first mid winter recess camp with Ms. Yang. originalText.text: My sons have been going to SHHK for 3 years. We couldn’t be more happy with the loving, safe and educational environment they provide. Esther and all the counselors are beyond kind and always communicating with us. We are sent pictures of our sons weekly of all the wonderful activities they provide and how much fun they have after school. We highly recommend SHHK as a fantastic after school!

originalText.text: My family and I have been with Super Happy Healthy Kids from the beginning.  Our students, parents, and team members are like my second family. We are very grateful to be able to share the love and watch the students grow up to be good human beings. We appreciate partnering up with the school, teachers, school officers, and custodians. Such a good feeling to wake up every morning to go work with the people that we love. It is no longer work for us, but love and play.

text.text: My family and I have been with Super Happy Healthy Kids from the beginning.  Our students, parents, and team members are like my second family. We are very grateful to be able to share the love and watch the students grow up to be good human beings. We appreciate partnering up with the school, teachers, school officers, and custodians. Such a good feeling to wake up every morning to go work with the people that we love. It is no longer work for us, but love and play.

originalText.text: My two girls went to Super Happy Healthy Kids. Now one is in high school and the other is in college. I am grateful that the organization emphasizes healthy eating by serving organic food and spring water. My girls learned karate and self-defense. It has increased their self-esteem. It is wonderful to see how the kids have grown from age 4 to teenagers, not just with my girls, but with all Super Happy Healthy Kids students.
